forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
